greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = floor(n/phi(n)).
comment: Reference does not include the floor function.
See A007694 for the numbers for which n/phi(n) is an integer, and A049237 for the ratios.
reference: D. M. Burton, Elementary Number Theory, Allyn and Bacon Inc. Boston MA, 1976, Prob. 7-4 3, p. 152.
link: Harry J. Smith, Table of n, a(n) for n=1,...,2000
formula: A062356(n = 2k+1) = 1 except for n in A036798.
program: (PARI) (a(n)=n\eulerphi(n)); vector(250,n,a(n)) \\ Edited by _M. F. Hasler_, Jul 02 2016
(PARI) { for (n=1, 2000, write("b062356.txt", n, " ", floor(n/eulerphi(n))) ) } \\ _Harry J. Smith_, Aug 05 2009; irrelevant realprecision(...) deleted by _M. F. Hasler_, Jul 02 2016
results.author: _Jason Earls_, Jul 07 2001
